title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Simmer tomato sauce with garlic and cream.
Add chicken and cook for 10 more minutes.
